Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Carpinteria
There were no other sightings in Carpinteria on or around December 16th 2009
divs: Sighting DetailsCarpinteria California, Dec 16th 4am Last night at 4am as i stepped outside to investigate a noise, probably raccoons on the front porch, i looked up into the sky. Over the mountains about a mile to the north a dark large object with dim lights silhouetting its shape started moving towards me, it must have been a few thousand feet up in the sky. It made absolutely no noise and was very large , maybe 250ft long and 100 ft wide (just a guess). It moved from the mountains traveling south to just over my head and started to hover, it then rotated and pointed east. Like a flash it disappeared at increadible speed, making no noise, into the eastern horizon .
